element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm evaluates the convergent or divergent nature of the flow passing through a cell, applying a local analysis

element.name: METHOD
element.text: the method to use may be selected between: * Aspect. Based on the aspect of the surrounding cells. * Gradient. Based on the gradient vector.

element.name: RESULT
element.text: Positive values indicate convergence and negative values divergence.
